group_1.textLeft: Is there a way for Magical Girls to not@turn into Witches?

group_1.textRight: Magical Girls will all become Witches.@It's a fate they cannot escape.
As far as I know, there's no way to prevent@it from happening.

group_1.textLeft: That's horrible... You've been deceiving us.

group_1.textRight: I never had any intention of deceiving you.
I said that I wanted you to become Magical@Girls in exchange for a wish being granted.
I communicated this to you properly, and you@agreed to those terms.
That is what happened, right?

group_1.textLeft: You didn't say anything about Magical Girls@turning into Witches!

group_1.textRight: You didn't ask.
It doesn't inconvenience you in the slightest@not to know.
Besides, most Magical Girls don't realize@that until the end.

group_1.textLeft: Everyone became Magical Girls because@they believed in hope!

group_1.textRight: You girls had wishes you wanted granted,@and I granted those wishes.
When I did, you agreed to pay the price@for your wishes to come true.
It was a fair trade.

group_1.textLeft: We could talk all day, but I don't think@we'll ever reach an understanding.

group_1.textRight: Well then, let's talk about something@more constructive.

group_1.textLeft: I have nothing more to say to you.

group_1.textRight: Nothing?
You want to avoid turning into a Witch,@don't you?
Aren't you curious about what the Magius@are up to in Kamihama?

group_1.textLeft: Do you know something about that?

group_1.textRight: Not any more than you do.
But I can make a conjecture based on that@knowledge.
Though it would be difficult with what little@information we have now.
If you share what you know with me, I'd@be able to make a more educated guess.
It's not a bad deal, right?
Depending on what you learn, I might be@able to tell you how to not become a Witch.
Madoka, it's not like we want to turn@Magical Girls into Witches.
That's just what happens.

group_1.textLeft: Go and investigate it yourself, Kyubey.

group_1.textRight: I'm unable to enter Kamihama City.
I don't know.

group_1.textLeft: I can't promise that I'll share information@with you...

group_1.textRight: I understand. But I would be glad if you@would consider it.
See you around, Madoka.
